summary: Adds ESO combat and some exploration music.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys,
<br />
<br />Love ESO? Tired of Skyrim music? Then this mod is for you!
<br />
<br />=================================================
<br />
<br />Features:
<br />
<br />This mod simply replaces all Combat music (except Boss music). It also adds some exploration music and town music.
<br />
<br />=================================================
<br />
<br />Instalation: Put the mod files in your data.
<br />
<br />=================================================
author: Oeloeboele
